GSD.description:
nilfs2: fix use-after-free bug of struct nilfs_root

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.2 by commit 6251c9c0430d70cc221d0bb907b278bd99d7b066. For more details please see the references link.
